de.hsrm.swt02.restserver.resource

Class WorkflowCommandResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsrm.swt02.restserver.resource.WorkflowCommandResource

  • public class WorkflowCommandResource
extends Object
    This class is called if client sends request to operate on workflows.

    • Method Detail

      • startWorkflow

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response startWorkflow(String workflowid,
                                      @HeaderParam(value="username")
                                      String username)
        This method executes the request to start an existing workflow. This operation will be published on the message broker.
        Parameters:
        workflowid - states which workflow should be started
        username - is for checking if user is authorized to execute this request
        Returns:
        200 if successful, 500 + error code as String if not

      • forward

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response forward(String stepid,
                                String itemid,
                                @HeaderParam(value="username")
                                String username)
        This method sets steps in progress. This operation will be published on the message broker.
        Parameters:
        stepid - indicates which step is currently worked on
        itemid - indicates which item is currently worked on
        username - is for checking if user is authorized to execute this request
        Returns:
        200 if successful, 500 + error code as String if not
